com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

Interface PathToolDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AirbrushTool, EraserTool, FreeformShapeTool, PaintbrushTool, PencilTool

    public interface PathToolDelegate
    A delegate class responsible for rendering shapes drawn by the PathToolDelegate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPoint(Scratch scratch, Stroke stroke, Paint strokePaint, Point lastPoint, Point thisPoint)
      Adds a point to the path begun via a call to startPath(Scratch, Stroke, Paint, Point).
      void completePath(Scratch scratch, Stroke stroke, Paint strokePaint, Paint fillPaint)
      Completes the path begun via a call to startPath(Scratch, Stroke, Paint, Point).
      void startPath(Scratch scratch, Stroke stroke, Paint strokePaint, Point initialPoint)
      Begins drawing a path on the given graphics context.

    • Method Detail

      • startPath

        void startPath(Scratch scratch,
               Stroke stroke,
               Paint strokePaint,
               Point initialPoint)
        Begins drawing a path on the given graphics context.
        Parameters:
        scratch - The scratch buffer on which to draw.
        stroke - The stroke with which to draw
        strokePaint - The paint with which to draw
        initialPoint - The first point defined on the path

      • addPoint

        void addPoint(Scratch scratch,
              Stroke stroke,
              Paint strokePaint,
              Point lastPoint,
              Point thisPoint)
        Adds a point to the path begun via a call to startPath(Scratch, Stroke, Paint, Point).
        Parameters:
        scratch - The scratch buffer on which to draw.
        stroke - The stroke with which to draw
        strokePaint - The paint with which to draw
        lastPoint - The last point added to the current path
        thisPoint - The new point to add to the current path

      • completePath

        void completePath(Scratch scratch,
                  Stroke stroke,
                  Paint strokePaint,
                  Paint fillPaint)
        Completes the path begun via a call to startPath(Scratch, Stroke, Paint, Point).
        Parameters:
        scratch - The scratch buffer on which to draw.
        stroke - The stroke with which to draw
        strokePaint - The paint with which to render the stroke
        fillPaint - The paint with which to fill the shape, null to indicate shape should not be filled
